issues_solved.solution: Added ml-auto to navigation container to push items right

issues_solved.problem: View plans button showing black instead of white
issues_solved.solution: Replaced Button component with native <button> element for full style control
issues_solved.root_cause: Button component has default bg-zinc-900 that overrides custom classes

issues_solved.problem: Free plan banner showing dark gray (#2B2B2B) instead of black (#000000)
issues_solved.solution: Changed from bg-[#2B2B2B] to bg-black for exact color match
issues_solved.root_cause: Used approximation instead of exact Figma hex value

issues_solved.problem: Card component blocking custom bg-black on banner
issues_solved.solution: Replaced Card with native <div> for banner to allow custom background
issues_solved.root_cause: Card component has hardcoded bg-white in base className

issues_solved.problem: Settings header not spanning full viewport width
issues_solved.solution: Restructured layout: separate full-width container from constrained content using border-b on outer div
issues_solved.root_cause: Header was nested inside content area with sidebar

issues_solved.problem: Next.js dev tools button visible in bottom left
issues_solved.solution: Added JavaScript in layout.tsx to target nextjs-portal element and hide with display: none
issues_solved.root_cause: Dev tools rendered in shadow DOM, unreachable by CSS selectors

issues_solved.solution: Added border-b to Settings header container and border-t to card footers
issues_solved.root_cause: Missed border/divider layers in Figma structure analysis

issues_solved.problem: Spacing inconsistencies (16px used instead of 24px standard)
issues_solved.solution: Changed space-y-4 to space-y-6, py-4 to py-6 throughout for consistent 24px spacing
issues_solved.root_cause: Did not extract exact spacing values from Figma specs initially

component_library.insight: Styled components with hardcoded defaults (Card bg-white, Button bg-zinc-900) prevent custom class overrides
component_library.solution: Use native HTML elements (<div>, <button>) when custom styling is required
component_library.prevention: Update component library to use cn() utility for proper class merging

color_accuracy.insight: Color approximations lead to visual mismatches
color_accuracy.solution: Always use exact hex values from Figma API, never approximate
color_accuracy.prevention: Auto-detect color mismatches in self-healing engine

spacing_precision.insight: Figma uses consistent spacing systems (often 24px for enterprise apps)
spacing_precision.solution: Extract exact pixel values and map to Tailwind classes (24px = 6, 16px = 4)
spacing_precision.prevention: Query Figma API for spacing values before code generation

layout_structure.insight: Full-width dividers require separate container from constrained content
layout_structure.solution: Use border-b on full-width outer div, place constrained content inside
layout_structure.prevention: Analyze Figma layer structure to identify full-width vs constrained elements

shadow_dom.insight: Shadow DOM elements cannot be targeted with standard CSS
shadow_dom.solution: Use JavaScript querySelector to target shadow host elements directly
shadow_dom.prevention: Document common shadow DOM patterns (Next.js dev tools, etc.)

component_style_conflicts.description: Styled components with hardcoded backgrounds/colors block custom Tailwind classes
component_style_conflicts.frequency: High - occurs with Card and Button components
component_style_conflicts.solution: Use native HTML or update component library with cn() utility

spacing_systems.description: Enterprise designs typically use 24px spacing system (1.5rem in Tailwind)
spacing_systems.solution: Map 24px to py-6, space-y-6, gap-6, mb-6

color_precision.description: Pure black (#000000) vs dark grays (#2B2B2B, #1F1F1F) are visually distinct
color_precision.solution: Always use exact Figma hex values, never approximate

layout_constraints.description: Full-width elements (dividers) mixed with constrained content (1400px) require nested containers
layout_constraints.solution: Outer full-width container, inner max-w-[1400px] mx-auto
